info.title: MySQLManagementClient
info.description: The Microsoft Azure management API provides create, read, update, and delete functionality for Azure MySQL resources including servers, databases, firewall rules, VNET rules, security alert policies, log files and configurations with new business model.

get.description: Gets the private link resources for MySQL server.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group that contains the resource. You can obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription ID that identifies an Azure subscription.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for the request.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets a private link resource for MySQL server.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group that contains the resource. You can obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.

parameters.name: groupName
parameters.description: The name of the private link resource.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription ID that identifies an Azure subscription.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for the request.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

CloudError.description: An error response from the Batch service.

code.description: An identifier for the error. Codes are invariant and are intended to be consumed programmatically.

details.description: A list of additional details about the error.

message.description: A message describing the error, intended to be suitable for display in a user interface.

target.description: The target of the particular error. For example, the name of the property in error.

CloudErrorBody.description: An error response from the Batch service.

nextLink.description: Link to retrieve next page of results.

PrivateLinkResourceListResult.description: A list of private link resources

groupId.description: The private link resource group id.

requiredMembers.description: The private link resource required member names.

PrivateLinkResourceProperties.description: Properties of a private link resource.

ApiVersionParameter.name: api-version
ApiVersionParameter.description: The API version to use for the request.

ResourceGroupParameter.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupParameter.description: The name of the resource group that contains the resource. You can obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.
